EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Hortonworks_Future of Data Roadshow(HFDR)_Q3-416.SWMY - Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You at the Future of Data Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re sorry you were unable to attend the Hortonworks Future of Data Roadshow.
We’d like to offer you a taste of the event and some inspiration to help you find new ways to drive value in your enterprise with data.
Pivotal has put together a collection of related resources, including the Pivotal HDB on Hortonworks HDP sandbox, that you can check out here <[[https://pivotal.io/event/future-of-data/resources]]>.
Pivotal and Hortonworks continue to work together to offer enterprises a comprehensive and powerful platform for managing, analyzing and operationalizing data at scale. Watch this webinar <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/high-performance-interactive-sql-analytics-machine-learning-hadoop/]]> to learn more about the role of Hadoop Native SQL in turning data into insight and action.
Ready to talk to Pivotal about the future of data at your enterprise? Contact us today <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>!
Thanks,
The Pivotal Team
